# UITextSmartDashesType.yes

**Case**

Enable smart dashes.

## Declaration

```swift
case yes
```

## Constants

- **UITextSmartDashesType.default**: Use the default smart dash behavior.
- **UITextSmartDashesType.no**: Disable smart dashes.

items.description: Use the default smart dash behavior.
